name: reconversion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a process in which someone changes back to a religion or belief they previously followed: She made a silent deathbed re-conversion to Catholicism. re-conversions of Christians back to Hinduism
the act of changing a building or vehicle from its previous use for a second, third, etc. time: The council has permitted reconversion back to residential use. Vessels arrived at the boatyard 24 hours a day, for repairs, refits, and reconversions.
More examplesFewer examplesHis re-conversion to the church was a seven-year process.In 1568 he began training missionary priests for the reconversion of England to Catholicism.The outbuildings can be used for this purpose later on, by means of reconversion.
